vsParam:
Huh, Anise, you're sighing in despair.
Stop sighing, or it'll draw Punis here.

Really!? I know luck will leave you,
but I've never heard such a saying...

Hee hee, it's common sense in Fairyland... But that's not
my point! Anise, what's wrong with you? You're in trouble?

Yeah. Here's the thing. The next lesson is a stratum investigation and
everyone in relicology needs to dig the ground with shovels...

Alright, I need to pull myself together, but you know I... got no strength
or stamina. I don't want to cause them more trouble.

Ah, I see... You can just leave things that demand
strength and stamina to strong people.

No, no way!
I'm one of this class, so I need to contribute too!

Oh, that's your style...
Um... We'd better figure out a solution...
Now you need to use your head.

Ru Sensei!?
Use my head... What do you mean?

Just literally.
Do you think one can be omnipotent?

As an expert of relicologyâ€”"sage", you need to use your head
more often and deal with problems flexibly. See you.

Use our head more often and
deal with problems flexibly... I see!
[px], can you do me a favor?

Could you please make a light
but durable shovel for me with alchemy?

Oh, that's using your head!
With a handier item, your work will be easier!

Hey, [px]!
You will help her, right?
Let me make you a especially light one.
Let me make you an especially durable one.

Hahaha...
If it's too light, it might hurt me...

Yup, I need exactly an exceptionally durable one!
Oh, make it as light as possible...
Let me make you a especially light one!
Let me make you an especially durable one!

Hahaha...
If it's too light, it might hurt me...

Yup, I need exactly an exceptionally durable one!
Oh, make it as light as possible...

But I trust your skills, [px].
Sorry to bother you!
